title: Am I gay because I love boys? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on what you mean by "boys" and by "love." Sexual attraction to pre-pubescent boys is a paraphilia (i.e., pedophilia).http://www.quora.com/After-I-browsed-through-the-deep-web-for-the-first-time-although-I-didnt-see-with-my-eyes-something-disturbing-Im-glad-I-didnt-I-read-about-it-Why-do-some-people-enjoy-violence-so-much-Why-do-people-do-those-sick-unthinkable-things/answer/Dan-Robb-2 http://www.quora.com/If-homosexuality-is-a-physiological-condition-like-autism-and-Down-syndrome-then-why-is-it-considered-wrong-to-try-to-cure-it/answer/Dan-Robb-2
